text: Gupse Özay (born 30 July 1984) is a Turkish actress and scriptwriter. ==Life and career== Gupse Özay was born in İzmir, Turkey. She is of Circassian descent.https://www.hurriyet.com.tr/kelebek/yalan-dunya-nin-cerkez- guzelleri-19945409 She studied at Radio Television and Cinema Department of Ege University. She was awarded with a documentary called Yaman Yaşamışım, which she shot with her friends during her university years. She played in Yalan Dünya as Nurhayat and became a social media phenomenon. == Filmography == * Yalan Dünya (2012–2014) – Nurhayat * Deliha (2014) – Zeliha (Actress, writer) * One Hand (2015) – Noor * Küçük Esnaf (2016) –Burcu * Görümce (2016) – Yeliz (Actress, writer) * Tatlim Tatlim (2017) – (Actress) * Deliha 2 (2018) – Zeliha (Actress, writer and director) * Eltilerin Savaşı (2020) – Sultan (Actress, writer) ==References== Category:Living people Category:1984 births Category:Turkish actresses Category:People from İzmir Category:Turkish people of Circassian descent
title: Gupse Özay
